Package coupon.sys.core.dao.db

Class CustomerDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDao

    public class CustomerDaoDb
extends Object
implements CustomerDao
    This class is a part of the DAO layer. The class which communicates between the customer's object related methods and the data base through sql queries.
    Version:
    1.0 September 18, 2018.
    Author:
    Julio Hernan Trajtemberg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CustomerDaoDb​()
      Constructs the class that communicates with the db and initializes the pool variable with the Connection pool's instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCouponToCustomer​(Coupon coupon, Customer customer)
      This method adds a coupon to a customer.
      void createCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Create Customer, the method checks if the company already exists if it doesn't it crates it and if does throws exception
      Collection<Customer> getAllCustomers​()
      This method receives all the customer's records of all the customers from the data base.
      Collection<Coupon> getCoupons​(Customer customer)
      This method receives all the logged customer's coupons from the records of the data base.
      Customer getCustomer​(long id)
      This method receives the customer's record from the data base, using the received customer's id parameter.
      long getCustomerId​(String customerName)
      Get customer from Customer table by ID
      Long login​(String name, String password)
      A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
      void removeCustomer​(Customer customer)
      This method removes the customer's record from the data base, using the received customer parameter and removes the customer from joined table
      void updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
      This method updates some columns in the customer's record in the data base, using the received customer parameter.

        public Long login​(String name,
                  String password)
           throws CustomerDaoDbException,
                  ConnectionPoolException,
                  InterruptedException,
                  CryptoHashException
        A method for login into the system through passing user name and password. The password is validated by converting the users input into system hash encryptions used and matching the hash with the one already written on the DB
